## Data generated by run_analysis.R
All_data.csv - combines all the data for all variables including both test and train sets into a single data set

## Data generated by assgn2.R
Xallmean.csv - Extracts the columns of the 561-feature vector whose names contain "mean" or "Mean"
##
Xallstd.csv - Extracts the columns of the 561-feature vector whose names contain "std"

## Data generated by assgn3.R
yall_name.csv - the activity numbers are replaced explicitly by descriptive activity names (WALKING, etc.)

## Data generated by assgn4.R
Xall_name.csv - the columns of the 561-feature vector (X) are now named after the explicit features as given in "features.txt".

## Data generated by assgn5.R
Xysub_splitmean.txt - average for each variable for each activity and each subject
